{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$27.0M in 2021-2022** on contracts with PURESPIRIT SOLUTIONS.

Across 375 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 14 have at least one amendment (4%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 57% and the average number of amendments was 1.21. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$7.9M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.49 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$210.6K. The longest contract was 7.01 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$12.2M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
